references.reason: This paper pioneered the end-to-end optimized neural image compression methods, which the current work builds upon and improves.

references.paper_title: Soft-to-hard vector quantization for end-to-end learning compressible representations
references.reason: This paper introduced the concept of soft-to-hard vector quantization, which is relevant to the current work's approach to lattice vector quantization.

references.paper_title: Joint autoregressive and hierarchical priors for learned image compression
references.reason: This paper introduced a sophisticated context model for entropy coding which is compared against in the current work.

references.paper_title: On Lovász' lattice reduction and the nearest lattice point problem
references.reason: This paper provides the theoretical foundation for Babai's rounding technique, which is a key component of the proposed OLVQ method.
This paper provides the fundamental theory of lattice quantization, which is essential for understanding the proposed OLVQ method.
